scripts.lambda:prep: npm install --omit=dev && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/function.zip index.js src package.json node_modules
scripts.lambda:update:prod: npm run lambda:prep && npm run lambda:push:prod
scripts.lambda:update:staging: npm run lambda:prep && npm run lambda:push:staging
scripts.lambda:update:staging-alt: npm run lambda:prep && npm run lambda:push:staging-alt
scripts.lambda:update:staging-alt2: npm run lambda:prep && npm run lambda:push:staging-alt2
scripts.lambda:update:uat: npm run lambda:prep && npm run lambda:push:uat
